name: Introduction to Web Development
description: Learn the basics of web development and build your own website from scratch.

name: JavaScript Fundamentals
description: Understand the core concepts of JavaScript and how to use it to build dynamic web applications.

name: ReactJS: Building User Interfaces
description: Learn how to build user interfaces with the popular JavaScript library ReactJS.

name: NodeJS: Building Backends
description: Build scalable and efficient backends with NodeJS and understand how to connect to databases.

name: Advanced CSS and SASS
description: Take your CSS skills to the next level with SASS and learn how to write efficient and maintainable stylesheets.

name: Full Stack Development with MERN
description: Build full-stack web applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS).

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Understand the basics of data structures and algorithms and learn how to implement them in code.
